author: Guy Jacobson
description: “This drink was inspired by the great classic sours such as the ‘Mulata’, ‘Daisy de Santiago’, ‘The Last Word’ & ‘20th Century Cocktail’.The name and story draw from the species of bat that lived in the rafters of Don Facundo’s first distillery and inspired the BACARDÍ bat logo, a symbol of family, prosperity and health.”
name: The Leaf Nose
recipeIngredient: 10 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
